question.text: A sailboat runs before the wind with a constant speed of {x=random(10);} m/s in a direction 42 degrees north of west. How far west has the sailboat traveled in 25 minutes?

Playing shortstop, you pick up a ground ball and throw it to second base. The ball is thrown horizontally, with a speed of {x=10+random(10);} m/s directly toward point A. When the ball reaches the second baseman 0.45 seconds later, it is caught at point B. How far were you from the second baseman?

Playing shortstop, you pick up a ground ball and throw it to second base. The ball is thrown horizontally, with a speed of {x=10+random(10);} m/s directly toward point A. When the ball reaches the second baseman {x=((10+random(50))/10)} seconds later, it is caught at point B. What is the distance of vertical drop?

On a hot summer day, a young girl swings on a rope above the local swimming hole. When she lets go of the rope her initial velocity is {x=1+random(4);} m/s at an angle of 35 degrees above the horizontal. If she is in flight for 0.616 s, how high above the water was she when she let go of the rope?

Astronomers have discovered volcanoes on Io, a moon of Jupiter. One of them, named Loki, ejects lava to a maximum height of {x=(2+random(5))*100000;} m. What is the initial speed of the lava? (The acceleration of gravity on Io is 1.8 m/s^2.)
